whatIsBrc: The Blockchain RBU Chapter is a dynamic, student-driven initiative fostering a culture of decentralized development and blockchain programming at Ramdeobaba University Nagpur. Serving as a dedicated platform, the chapter empowers students with hands-on experience in the rapidly evolving field of web3 development.

BRC has organized numerous icebreaking events, with Cohorts standing out as one of the most popular initiatives. Through Cohorts, we have successfully guided many students in initiating their journey into web3 development. Notably, our team includes several hackathon winners, further exemplifying our commitment to excellence and skill development within the blockchain space.
aboutus.ourGoals: The Blockchain RBU Chapter is committed to empowering students in web3 development by bridging the theory-application gap through practical experiences and essential skills. We actively seek industry partnerships for internships, job opportunities, and funding, ensuring real-world applicability for student-led web3 projects.
aboutus.whyBrc: As the catalyst for Web3 adoption, the Blockchain RBU Chapter fosters innovation and collaboration at Ramdeobaba University Nagpur. Our dedication to blockchain education and research creates an environment that encourages creativity among students. Joining BRC means being part of a community revolutionizing technology and innovation in the ever-evolving web3 landscape.

event1: Join us for an exciting event where you'll dive into the world of blockchain through engaging games. Follow our Instagram handle to stay updated on upcoming registration dates and more details. Get ready for a unique learning experience filled with fun activities!

question1: Our club is open to all web3 enthusiasts, whether you're a beginner or an experienced developer looking to enhance your skills. We hold interviews once or twice a year, so make sure to follow us on Instagram to stay updated on opportunities to join and participate!
question2: How frequently do events and workshops occur?
We have a hands-on session regularly. We also hold workshops and showcases & we would recommend you to join our community to get updates.
question3: You can expect regular exposure to new and unexplored topics in blockchain that can help you stand out. Our club offers engaging and interactive sessions with fellow members, making learning both enjoyable and enriching.
question4: Who should I reach out to if I have any questions?
If you have any questions or comments, please don't hesitate to contact us by filling the form in Contact Us Page. We would be happy to stay engaged via email even after the event
